description:
NTS Map: 083C01Long south facing haul up to Tuff Puff summit, there is over 1km of vertical here.  If you want to go to Kinglet Lake, which is smack dab in the middle of the mountain, follow the trail, then branch off to the west about half way up.

In total about 6-8 hrs in.
directions: Trail head is about 1.2 km SW of entrance to Kootany Plains. On the west edge of the wildlife fence.
title: Tuff Puff
